raw_body: RODRIGO – CANDAPPA – JAMES NOEL – Safe in the Arms of Jesus. Beloved husband of Mareen (nee Enas),​ loving father of Fabian (Hilton Abu Dhabi) and Susan (HNB Assurance),​ son of late Eric and Carmen,​ son-in-law of late Christie and Winifred Vandot. Remains will be laid at Supreme Flora Parlour (70 Makola Road,​ Makola) from 9.00 a.m. on Monday 29th April. Burial at Dalugama Church Cemetery at 4.30 p.m. on Tuesday 30th April.027833
